name: Text
description: Typography helpers and fluent text modifiers.

use: you want fluent, chainable text styles.
you need shared typography from the shadcn theme.
avoid: you prefer direct `TextStyle` usage without modifiers.

patterns.title: Headings and paragraphs
patterns.code:
Column(
  crossAxisAlignment: CrossAxisAlignment.start,
  children: [
    Text('Heading').h2,
    Text('Body copy goes here.').p,
  ],
)

theming: Modifiers resolve fonts and sizes from `ThemeData.typography`.
accessibility: Ensure heading hierarchy matches document structure.
do: Use heading modifiers for section structure.
dont: Mix multiple font families in the same paragraph without intent.
